#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
void read(unsigned long long int &);
      
int main() {
	unsigned long long int n;
	//cin>>n;
	read(n);
	cout<<(n*(n+1))/2<<endl;
	
	return 0;
}

inline void read(unsigned long long int &x){

        x=0;
        register char c=gc();
        for(;c<'0' || c>'9';c=gc());
         for(;c>='0' && c<='9';c=gc())
          x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+(c-'0');
      }
